0.text: Innate: Whenever Akshan uses a basic attack, he fires an additional shot after a delay that deals 50% AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against  minions. If this shot is cancelled, he gains 20 − 75 (based on level)  ×  (1 + 100% bonus attack speed)  bonus movement speed decaying over 1 second.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Akshan uses a basic attack, he fires an additional shot after a delay that deals 50% AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions. If this shot is cancelled, he gains 20 − 75 (based on level)  ×  (1 + 100% bonus attack speed)  bonus movement speed decaying over 1 second.

1.text: The additional shot applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and can  critically strike for「 (61.25% +  12.25%) AD ( (122.5% +  24.5%) AD) 」「 70% total  critical damage 」physical damage.
1.html: The additional shot applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and can critically strike for「 (61.25% +  12.25%) AD ( (122.5% +  24.5%) AD) 」「 70% total  critical damage 」physical damage.

2.text: Innate: Akshan's basic attacks  on-hit and ability hits apply a stack to enemies for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 10 − 165 (based on level) bonus magic damage and, if the target is a  champion, Akshan is granted a 40 − 280 (based on level) (+ 35% bonus AD)  shield for 2 seconds. The shield may be gained only once every few seconds.
2.html: Innate: Akshan's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits apply a stack to enemies for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 10 − 165 (based on level) bonus magic damage and, if the target is a champion, Akshan is granted a 40 − 280 (based on level) (+ 35% bonus AD) shield for 2 seconds. The shield may be gained only once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Akshan throws a boomerang in the target direction that briefly grants  sight around its trajectory and deals physical damage to enemies hit,  revealing them for 1 second and extending its range each time it hits a target. If the boomerang hits an enemy  champion, Akshan gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1 second.
0.html: Active: Akshan throws a boomerang in the target direction that briefly grants sight around its trajectory and deals physical damage to enemies hit, revealing them for 1 second and extending its range each time it hits a target. If the boomerang hits an enemy champion, Akshan gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 1 second.

1.text: Once the boomerang has passed its original range and has not struck a target in the last 500 units of travelling, it homes back to Akshan and applies the same effects to enemies hit.
1.html: Once the boomerang has passed its original range and has not struck a target in the last 500 units of travelling, it homes back to Akshan and applies the same effects to enemies hit.

2.text: Avengerang's deals reduced damage against non-champions.

3.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
3.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Passive: Akshan marks enemy  champions that kill allied champions as Scoundrels for 60 seconds. If Akshan scores a  takedown against a Scoundrel while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, he receives an additional  100 and revives all  dead allied champions that they have slain after 1 second.
0.html: Passive: Akshan marks enemy champions that kill allied champions as Scoundrels for 60 seconds. If Akshan scores a takedown against a Scoundrel while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, he receives an additional 100 and revives all dead allied champions that they have slain after 1 second.

1.text: When Akshan claims a Scoundrel's bounty he removes the marks of all other enemies. Scoundrels refresh their mark duration on subsequent kills, and will have their mark removed when they die by any means. Akshan cannot mark enemies as Scoundrels while they are dead. Allies are revived at their summoning platform.
1.html: When Akshan claims a Scoundrel's bounty he removes the marks of all other enemies. Scoundrels refresh their mark duration on subsequent kills, and will have their mark removed when they die by any means. Akshan cannot mark enemies as Scoundrels while they are dead. Allies are revived at their summoning platform.

2.text: Active: Akshan enters  camouflage, which lasts indefinitely while he is near terrain or inside  brush, and for 2 seconds otherwise. While active, he can see trails leading toward Scoundrels, and while facing them if they are within 5000 units, he gains  bonus mana regeneration equal to 12% of his missing mana as well as  bonus movement speed.
2.html: Active: Akshan enters camouflage, which lasts indefinitely while he is near terrain or inside brush, and for 2 seconds otherwise. While active, he can see trails leading toward Scoundrels, and while facing them if they are within 5000 units, he gains  bonus mana regeneration equal to 12% of his missing mana as well as  bonus movement speed.

3.text: Going Rogue can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends Going Rogue immediately.
3.html: Going Rogue can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends Going Rogue immediately.

0.text: Active: Akshan can activate Heroic Swing three times before the ability goes on cooldown, and can use the third cast only after 0.5 seconds of the second cast. Akshan may input a attack or movement command to use the second and third casts.
0.html: Active: Akshan can activate Heroic Swing three times before the ability goes on cooldown, and can use the third cast only after 0.5 seconds of the second cast. Akshan may input a attack or movement command to use the second and third casts.

1.text: First Cast: Akshan prepares to swing for up to 2.125 seconds, firing a hook in the target direction that embeds in the first terrain hit. Heroic Swing's second cast can be used while the hook is attached. If the hook fails to attach or Akshan is moved or becomes  immobilized,  grounded, or  polymorphed within the duration, the preparation will end prematurely, cancelling Heroic Swing in the process.
1.html: First Cast: Akshan prepares to swing for up to 2.125 seconds, firing a hook in the target direction that embeds in the first terrain hit. Heroic Swing's second cast can be used while the hook is attached. If the hook fails to attach or Akshan is moved or becomes immobilized, grounded, or polymorphed within the duration, the preparation will end prematurely, cancelling Heroic Swing in the process.

2.text: Second Cast: Akshan  swings around the terrain in the target direction for 3 seconds, stopping upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain. While swinging, he rapidly fires at the nearest  visible enemy to deal them physical damage and apply  on-hit effects at 25% effectiveness per shot. Akshan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control during the dash.
2.html:
Second Cast: Akshan swings around the terrain in the target direction for 3 seconds, stopping upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain. While swinging, he rapidly fires at the nearest visible enemy to deal them physical damage and apply on-hit effects at 25% effectiveness per shot.
Akshan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control during the dash.

0.content: 30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 (+ 17.5% bonus AD)  ×  (1 + 0.3 per 100% bonus attack speed)

3.text: Third Cast: Akshan ends the swing by  jumping to the target location, though not through terrain, and fires one last shot at a nearby  visible enemy.
3.html: Third Cast: Akshan ends the swing by jumping to the target location, though not through terrain, and fires one last shot at a nearby visible enemy.

4.text: Scoring an enemy champion  takedown  reduces Heroic Swing's current cooldown to 0.5 seconds. The shots can  critically strike for「 (57.5% +  31.5%) bonus damage 」「 90% total  critical damage 」and apply  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
4.html: Scoring an enemy champion takedown  reduces Heroic Swing's current cooldown to 0.5 seconds. The shots can critically strike for「 (57.5% +  31.5%) bonus damage 」「 90% total  critical damage 」and apply  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

5.text: Avengerang and  Going Rogue can be cast during the third cast's dash.  Comeuppance can be cast at all points during Heroic Swing. Akshan prioritizes firing at enemy champions with stacks of  Dirty Fighting, will not fire while  Comeuppance is active, and  reveals himself while firing. Heroic Swing can be cast during Akshan's other abilities.
5.html: Avengerang and Going Rogue can be cast during the third cast's dash. Comeuppance can be cast at all points during Heroic Swing. Akshan prioritizes firing at enemy champions with stacks of Dirty Fighting, will not fire while Comeuppance is active, and reveals himself while firing. Heroic Swing can be cast during Akshan's other abilities.

0.text: Active: Akshan locks onto the target enemy champion and begins  channeling for 2.5 seconds,  revealing them as well as  revealing himself. He gradually stores bullets into his weapon over the duration.
0.html: Active: Akshan locks onto the target enemy champion and begins channeling for 2.5 seconds, revealing them as well as revealing himself. He gradually stores bullets into his weapon over the duration.

1.text: Comeuppance can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Comeuppance is placed on a 5-second  cooldown if the channel is cancelled.
1.html: Comeuppance can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Comeuppance is placed on a 5-second  cooldown if the channel is cancelled.

2.text: Recast: Akshan fires all stored bullets at the target, each briefly granting  sight around their trajectory and dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health). The shots can hit structures.
2.html: Recast: Akshan fires all stored bullets at the target, each briefly granting sight around their trajectory and dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, increased by 0% − 300% (based on target's missing health). The shots can hit structures.

3.text: Each bullet's damage applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness, and  executes  minions.

4.text: Akshan can move while channeling Comeuppance.

Unique – Warmonger: +2.5% omnivamp

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 12% /  8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Giant Slayer: Deal 0% − 15% (based on maximum health difference) bonus physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum health than you.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – GIANT SLAYER: Deal 0% − 15% (based on maximum health difference) bonus physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum health than you.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ENERGIZED: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Akshan enters  camouflage, which lasts indefinitely while he is near terrain or inside  brush, and for 2 seconds otherwise. While active, he can see trails leading toward Scoundrels, and while facing them if they are within 5000 units, he gains  bonus mana regeneration equal to 12% of his missing mana as well as  bonus movement speed.
